description: This Python script provides an example of how to authenticate and interact with Pipedream MCP servers using environment variables, external SDKs, and asynchronous programming. It defines a function to run an agent that communicates with MCP servers and handles exceptions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A class providing tools to interact with MCP servers.

classes.name: StreamableHTTPClientParams
classes.description: Configuration class for HTTP client parameters.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs an agent to perform a specified task, handling exceptions.
